init.title: Set up two-factor authentication using TOTP

error.invalid_code: Invalid code, please try again. If you get this error consistently, please make sure the clock of your Home Assistant system is accurate.

init.title: Set up one-time password delivered by notify component
init.description: Please select one of the notification services:

setup.title: Verify setup
setup.description: A one-time password has been sent via **notify.{notify_service}**. Please enter it below:

init.title: Set up two-factor authentication using hardware token
init.description: To activate two factor authentication, follow the instructions of your browser.

abort.register_error: Token is not registered. Please, try again or use another token.
abort.too_many_retry: Token is not registered. Too many failed attempts.
abort.cancelled: Registration canceled. Token is not registered.
abort.unsupported: Your browser doesn't support Web Authentication. Please use [Google Chrome](https://www.google.com/chrome/), [Firefox](https://www.mozilla.org/firefox/new/) or [Microsoft Edge](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/microsoft-edge).
abort.protocol: This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS).

error.credentials: Invalid token. Please, try again or use another token.
